name: Neuron Chain
description: Neuron is a crypto engineering organization that will build a super fast blockchain, which has +100k TPS and no gas fees Fastest Growth Ecosystem With Projects Covering DeFi, Neuron Wallet, Web3 & More, Neuron Has Also Developed a BRC20 /ERC20/ BEP20 Supported Wallet in Android & iOS. Neuron is the most valuable reflection token on the BNB Smart Chain network. Just hold $NEURON and earn $BUSD in passive income from trading volume. The goal of NeuronChain is to Create a Blockchain that can be used in various worlds easily fast and has a very low cost. In addition, Neuron Chain has built NeuronSwap so that traders can use Neuron for buying and selling transactions, not only Neuron, all tokens on the BEP20 network can use NeuronSwap with the advantage that neuronSwap is faster, flexible and costs lower. Neuron Chain will also build Neuron Wallet which is easier to use and more efficient and will be integrated with NeuronSwap so that traders will be easier in transactions.
